competitors.name: Juniper Networks
competitors.notes: American multinational developing and marketing networking products

competitors.name: Arista Networks
competitors.notes: Run by ex-Cisco exec Jayshree Ullal, extended data-center technology to campus and edge

competitors.name: Huawei
competitors.notes: Solid line of networking gear, huge competitor largely outside the United States

competitors.name: HPE/Aruba
competitors.notes: Took big leap into SD-WAN market with $925M acquisition of Silver Peak in 2020

competitors.name: VMware
competitors.notes: Competitor in virtualization and cloud infrastructure

competitors.name: Dell
competitors.notes: Controlled 27% of external storage systems market in Q2 2020

competitors.name: Lenovo
competitors.notes: Hyper-converged system sales increased 49% YoY to $72.1M in Q2 2020

competitors.name: Riverbed
competitors.notes: Competitor in WAN optimization and networking

context: Cisco Systems, Inc. is a networking and communications technology company focused on network infrastructure, security, and collaboration solutions. WebEx saw massive growth. Security and observability acquisitions.
